greeting.welcome: Hello! I am here to help you. What do you need today?
greeting.welcome_sir: Hello! I am here to help you. What do you need today, sir?
greeting.welcome_madam: Hello! I am here to help you. What do you need today, ma'am?
greeting.returning: Welcome back! How can I help you today?
greeting.language_set: From now on, I will speak to you in English.

language_detection.menu: Press 1 for English, 2 for Mandarin, 3 for Hindi, 4 for Tamil.
language_detection.confirm: Did I understand correctly? You want English?
language_detection.saved: I have saved your language preference.

common.repeat: Press 0 or say 'Repeat' anytime to hear me again.
common.slow_down: Tell me slowly — I am listening.
common.understood: I understand. Let me help you with that.
common.dont_worry: Don't worry, I will do it step by step with you.
common.help: Say 'Help' anytime if you need assistance.
common.main_menu: Returning to main menu. What else can I help you with?

zoom_join.name: Join Zoom Meeting
zoom_join.start: I will help you join a Zoom meeting. Do you have the meeting link or ID?
zoom_join.get_id: Please tell me your Zoom meeting ID or link. You can say it one number at a time.
zoom_join.opening_app: Now I will help you open the Zoom app.
zoom_join.entering_id: I heard the ID. Now entering it for you.
zoom_join.joining: Joining the meeting now. Please wait.
zoom_join.success: You are now in the meeting! Do you see other people?
zoom_join.need_audio: Do you want me to help you turn on your microphone?
zoom_join.need_video: Do you want me to help you turn on your camera?
zoom_join.complete: Great! You are all set. Enjoy your meeting!

phone_call.name: Make Phone Call
phone_call.start: I will help you make a phone call. Who would you like to call?
phone_call.get_number: Please tell me the phone number, or say the person's name from your contacts.
phone_call.confirm_number: I will call {number}. Is that correct?
phone_call.connected: You are now connected. Speak when you are ready.
phone_call.failed: I could not connect the call. Would you like to try again?

volume_adjust.name: Adjust Volume
volume_adjust.start: I will help you adjust the volume. Say 'louder', 'quieter', or a number from 1 to 10.

wifi_connect.name: Connect to Wi-Fi
wifi_connect.start: I will help you connect to Wi-Fi. Can you see the network name on your screen?
wifi_connect.get_network: Please tell me the network name you want to connect to.
wifi_connect.get_password: Now, please tell me the Wi-Fi password slowly.
wifi_connect.connecting: Connecting to {network}. This may take a moment.
wifi_connect.failed: I could not connect. Let me try again, or you can try a different network.

scam_check.name: Check for Scam
scam_check.start: I will check if this number is safe. Please tell me the phone number.
scam_check.checking: Checking the number now. One moment.
scam_check.safe: This number appears to be safe. It has {reports} positive reports.
scam_check.warning: Be careful! This number has {reports} scam reports. I recommend not answering.
scam_check.blocked: I have blocked this number for your safety.
scam_check.no_data: I don't have information about this number. Please be cautious.

sync_me_install.name: Scam Shield Setup
sync_me_install.intro: For your safety, I will now turn on Scam Shield. This uses Sync.me — trusted by over 10 million seniors worldwide and listed in the Top 100 safety tools on the Google Play Store. It warns you if a caller is not trustworthy. I will set this up for you. Is that okay?
sync_me_install.installing: Setting up Scam Shield now. This will only take a moment.
sync_me_install.success: Scam Shield is now active. Fake callers will show 'Potential Scam' before you answer. You are safe.
sync_me_install.already_active: Good news! Scam Shield is already protecting you.
sync_me_install.failed: I had trouble setting this up. Would you like to try again?

contact_family.name: Contact Family
contact_family.start: I will connect you to your family. Who would you like to reach?
contact_family.confirm: I will call {name} at {number}. Is that correct?
contact_family.no_contacts: I don't have any family contacts saved. Would you like to add one?

general_qa.listening: I am listening. Please ask me anything.
general_qa.follow_up: Do you want to do something after this?
general_qa.anything_else: Is there anything else I can help you with?

scam_shield.call_warning: Warning! This caller has been reported as a potential scam. Do you want to block this number?
scam_shield.blocked: I have blocked this number. You are safe.
scam_shield.status_active: Your Scam Shield is active and protecting you.
scam_shield.status_inactive: Your Scam Shield is not active. Would you like me to turn it on?

errors.not_understand: I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Can you please repeat?
errors.technical: I'm having technical difficulties. Let me try again.
errors.timeout: I didn't hear anything. Are you still there?

goodbye.end_call: Thank you for calling. Take care!
goodbye.end_session: Goodbye! I am always here when you need me.
goodbye.come_back: Call me anytime you need help. Goodbye!
